description: Returns a list of all user or group session mappings for the Amazon EMR Studio specified by StudioId.

nested_items.name: SessionMappings
nested_items.description: A list of session mapping summary objects. Each object includes session mapping details such as creation time, identity type (user or group), and Amazon EMR Studio ID.

nested_items.name: StudioId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon EMR Studio.

nested_items.name: IdentityId
nested_items.description: The globally unique identifier (GUID) of the user or group from the IAM Identity Center Identity Store.

nested_items.name: IdentityName
nested_items.description: The name of the user or group. For more information, see UserName and DisplayName in the IAM Identity Center Identity Store API Reference.

nested_items.name: IdentityType
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the identity mapped to the Amazon EMR Studio is a user or a group.

nested_items.name: SessionPolicyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the session policy associated with the user or group.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time the session mapping was created.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: The pagination token that indicates the next set of results to retrieve.
